ctx: Britanska vlada podeljuje več kot 100 novih koncesij za črpanje nafte in plina
content:
davek od dobicka naftno-plinskih podjetij v uk je trenutno 75%
...

junija so zakolicili, da naj bi bilo tako se 5 let, vendar s temle
dodatkom:

The tax rate for oil and gas companies will only return to 40% if
both average oil and gas prices fall to, or below, $71.40 per
barrel for oil and £0.54 per therm for gas, for two consecutive
quarters. This level is based on 20-year historical averages.

... kar je sicer vprasanje, koliksno tezo ima v praksi.

po drugi strani je norveski equinor obdavcen, kolkor je dolg in
sirok, in je se vedno posast...
author: crt
